statements: SELECT * FROM StudentEnrollment;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM StudentEnrollment WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT course_id, student_id FROM StudentEnrollment WHERE enrollment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM StudentEnrollment WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT enrollment_date, completion_status FROM StudentEnrollment WHERE course_id = 201;
SELECT * FROM StudentEnrollment WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date FROM StudentEnrollment WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(student_id) AS average_student_id FROM StudentEnrollment GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_enrollments FROM StudentEnrollment GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY total_enrollments DESC;
SELECT student_id, SUM(CAST(completion_status AS INT)) AS completed_courses, SUM(CAST(NOT completion_status AS INT)) AS in_progress_courses FROM StudentEnrollment GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE completed_courses > 5;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, completed_courses FROM students WHERE completed_courses < 3 ORDER BY completed_courses DESC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT course_name, course_credit_hours FROM courses WHERE course_credit_hours BETWEEN 3 AND 6 ORDER BY course_credit_hours ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE completed_courses >= 4;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN courses ON students.completed_courses = courses.course_credit_hours;
SELECT student_name, course_name, course_credit_hours FROM students JOIN courses ON students.completed_courses = courses.course_credit_hours WHERE students.completed_courses = 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, course_credit_hours FROM students JOIN courses ON students.completed_courses = courses.course_credit_hours ORDER BY student_name ASC, course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments WHERE student_id = 100;

SELECT student_name AS Name, course_name AS Course, enrollment_date AS EnrollmentDate FROM Students AS S JOIN Enrollments AS E ON S.student_id = E.student_id JOIN Courses AS C ON E.course_id = C.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM Enrollments WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT Students.student_id, Students.student_name, Courses.course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM Students
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Database%';
SELECT enrollment_id, completion_status FROM enrollments WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT student_name, course_name, assignment_name FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN progress p ON e.enrollment_id = p.enrollment_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE LENGTH(course_description) > 50;

SELECT student_name, course_name, assignment_score FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN progress ON enrollments.enrollment_id = progress.enrollment_id WHERE completion_status = true ORDER BY assignment_score DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, course_description FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, full_name, address FROM students WHERE date_of_birth >= '1999-01-01';
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, email FROM students WHERE address IS NULL;
SELECT enrollment_id, completion_status FROM enrollments WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;

SELECT full_name, email, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id ORDER BY full_name, course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING AVG(grade) > 80 ORDER BY average_grade DESC;
